description: This source file defines the StringIPC class, which implements the ObjectIPC interface to handle simple String-based inter-process communication (IPC). The class provides methods for JSON serialization and deserialization of a string value, with constructors and getters/setters.

classes.name: StringIPC
classes.description: A class that implements ObjectIPC to facilitate IPC using String data. It provides JSON serialization/deserialization and manages a single String value.

methods.name: StringIPC()
methods.description: Default constructor for creating an instance with no initial value.

methods.name: StringIPC(String val)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the object with a specific string value.

methods.name: getValue()
methods.description: Returns the current string value stored in the object.

methods.name: setValue(String str)
methods.description: Sets the string value in the object.

methods.name: toJSON()
methods.description: Serializes the StringIPC object to a JSONObject with key 's'.

methods.name: fromJSON(JSONObject buffer)
methods.description: Deserializes the object state from a JSONObject, extracting the string value for key 's'.
